title: Futuristic chamber with glowing energy beam
creator: itsiken
usage: Memory Parlor stealth lighting reference for cover blocks and firewall glow.
notes: Capture neon bevel edges and volumetric beam cues for future environment illustration pass.

title: Deduction Board UI Background
usage: 1024x768 deduction board backdrop for investigative UI overlay.
notes: Needs layered neon corkboard vibe with space for clue nodes and narrative callouts.

title: Clue Node Sprite Variations
usage: 64x64 node sprites representing active, solved, and locked clues on deduction board.
notes: Requires at least three variations with animated pulse option for narrative emphasis.

title: Evidence Type Icon Set
usage: 32x32 icon suite for physical, digital, testimonial, and forensic evidence categories.
notes: Icons must read at small sizes; include monochrome and color treatments.

title: Core UI Button Pack
usage: Interactive buttons (play, pause, settings, confirm, cancel) for menu overlays.
notes: Target 64x32 sprites with hover/pressed states; neon noir styling.

title: Generic Evidence Marker
usage: 32x32 placeholder sprite for generic evidence pickups.
notes: Needs blank label area for procedural numbering.

title: Fingerprint Evidence Sprite
usage: 32x32 sprite for latent fingerprint items.
notes: Supports neon-guided cyan lighting to align with Memory Parlor palette.

title: Confidential Document Sprite
usage: 32x32 sprite for dossier and report collectibles.
notes: Add subtle fold and holographic seal for narrative flair.

title: Neural Extractor Sprite
usage: 32x32 device sprite used in mind-hack missions.
notes: Depict compact tech device with blue accent lights and removable prongs.

title: Blood Spatter Evidence Sprite
usage: 32x32 sprite for forensic blood sample pickups.
notes: Stylise to remain readable while respecting M2 rating guidelines.

title: Kira Player Sprite Sheet
usage: 32x32 sprite sheet with idle, walk, and run animations across 4 directions.
notes: Detective coat silhouette with readable silhouette; 6 frames per animation recommended.

title: Civilian NPC Sprite Pack
usage: Five 32x32 civilian NPC variants for social hubs and investigation scenes.
notes: Represent faction-aligned outfits; include gender-diverse silhouettes.

title: Security Guard NPC Sprite Pack
usage: Three 32x32 guard NPC variants for stealth patrols.
notes: Include visor glow for detection cues; integrate faction insignia.

title: Neon District Tileset
usage: 16x16 tile atlas for rain-soaked neon city blocks.
notes: Needs wet reflections, signage layers, and animated neon strips.

title: Corporate Spires Tileset
usage: 16x16 tile atlas for sterile high-tech interiors.
notes: Feature frosted glass, chrome flooring, and light columns.

title: Archive Undercity Tileset
usage: 16x16 tile atlas for ancient underground data vaults.
notes: Blend corroded metal with glowing conduits and dust particles.

title: Zenith Sector Tileset
usage: 16x16 tile atlas for imposing futurist plazas.
notes: Incorporate holographic banners and elevated rail tracks.

title: Rain Particle Sprite
usage: 2x2 sprite for rain particle effects.
notes: Provide two-frame animation for streak variability.

title: Neon Glow Particle Sprite
usage: 4x4 sprite for neon shimmer effects.
notes: Include additive-friendly alpha handling and color variants.

title: Memory Fragment Particle Sprite
usage: 8x8 ethereal particle for memory reconstruction sequences.
notes: Design layered transparent wisps with subtle motion cues.

title: Screen Overlay Effects Pack
usage: Full-screen overlays for flash, scanline, and glitch effects.
notes: Deliver PNG overlays with alpha channel; align with performance constraints.
